content.html: Here it is… Broadcom to Acquire VMware for Approximately $61 Billion in Cash and Stock Broadcom (formerly Avago) will rename to VMware. VMware has time to “go shop” for other offers. Both boards and Michael Dell support it. End of an era. $VMW investors.broadcom.com/news-releases/…
content.value:
Here it is…

Broadcom to Acquire VMware for Approximately $61 Billion in Cash and Stock

Broadcom (formerly Avago) will rename to VMware. VMware has time to “go shop” for other offers. Both boards and Michael Dell support it. End of an era. $VMW investors.broadcom.com/news-releases/…
